description: Creating modifications is encouraged in Stonehearth and many users create and share SMOD files with the Stonehearth community. To add a mod to Stonehearth, place the SMOD file in one of the following directories:
Once the SMOD file is placed in the mods folder, open Stonehearth and the mod is accessible and active.

Since SMOD files are compressed with Zip compression, they can be expanded using a Zip decompression utility. Simply rename the .smod extension to .zip and use a Zip decompression program to expand the contents and view them. Some Zip programs include Corel WinZip, 7-Zip, Apple Archive Utility, and ES File Explorer.
